index.name: louisville
index.subtitle: Archives and Special Collections, University of Louisville
index.about: The University of Louisville Libaries includes Archives & Special Collections, the Art Library, Ekstrom East and West Libraries, Kornhauser Health Sciences, Law and Music.
index.description: Metadata guidelines created for UofL Digital Initiatives.

mappings.title: CONTENTdm Cookbook: Recipes for metadata entry for UofL Digital Initiatives
mappings.description: This document is intended as a guide to data entry and descriptive cataloging for University of Louisville (UofL) digital projects using CONTENTdm software.
